gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Kings 102, Nuggets 98
gameRecap.excerpt: The Kings defeated the Nuggets, 102-98. De'Aaron Fox led the way for the Kings with 30 points (12-26 FG), eight rebounds and eight assists, while Domantas Sabonis added 20 points, 13 rebounds and seven assists in the victory. Aaron Gordon tallied 25 points and a season-high 15 rebounds for the Nuggets in the losing effort. The Kings improve to 31-23 on the season, while the Nuggets fall to 36-19.
